title.narrative: Burkina Faso Economic Governance, GovTech and Citizen Engagement Project

description.narrative: The proposed development objective of the project is to enhance domestic revenue mobilization and improve the use of public resources by strengthening accountability mechanisms, revenue collection systems and public expenditure management.

participating-org.narrative: BURKINA FASO Ministry of Territorial Administration and Decentralization (MATD)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Acquisition of an accounting software | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) acquire and install in MoEF, notlater than three (3) months after the Effective Date, accounting software with specifications satisfactory to the Association | DueDate :20-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Establishment of a Project Steering Committee | Description :The Recipient shall, by no later than three (3)months after the Effective Date, establish and maintain, throughout the implementation of the Project, a Project SteeringCommittee, with a composition, mandate, terms of reference, and resources acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :20-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an accountant | Description :The Recipient shall: (i) by no later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, recruit an accountant to the Project Coordination Unit. | Due Date :20-Dec-2016

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of the remaining core team | Description :The recipient shall recruit three (3) program experts anda monitoring and evaluation specialist to the Project Coordination Unit, in each case with qualifications, experience and terms ofreference acceptable to the Association by no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, | Due Date :20-Mar-2017

title.narrative: Reduction of UBDs resulting from the digitalization of customs clearance
Identified officials (ministers and parliamentarians) who have declared their assets
Identified officials of phase 1 (high officials expect the ministers and parliamentarians) who have declared their assets on line
The number of communities adopting Community Score Card
Number of Government and CSOs staff trained in new accountability tools, citizens engagement and public financial management (20 percent of which are women)
Citizen's budget published by end of the first quarter of the budget year
Number of women trained in new accountability tools, citizens engagement mechanisms and PFM
Grievances addressed by the ministry of Education
Grievances addressed by the ministry of Health
Improved strategic budget allocation: Budget allocations aligned with policy priorities and PFM Act (Percentage of line ministries preparing programs budget)
Improved budget credibility and control in budget preparation and execution (Number of N@folo modules – preparation, and execution — corrected and ready for testing)
Identified officials who made their online assets declaration
Improved public procurement capacity (number of certified public procurement specialists)
Reduced alleged corruption cases pending adjudication (percentage of pending case judgments issued)
Citizen satisfaction with quality of Education service delivery in target schools
Citizen satisfaction with quality of Health service delivery in target health centers
Share of large enterprises tax payment through e-SINTAX
Increased revenue mobilization (share of tax revenue collected through e-SINTAX)
Improved decision making process in taxation management (Information management system for taxation management operational)
